decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): LOCATION PLAN; S01 SITE LOCATION PLAN REV 1; EX01 EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN REV 2; EX02 EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN REV 1; EX03 EXISTING FIRST FLOOR PLAN REV 1; EX04 EXISTING LOFT FLOOR PLAN REV 1; EX05 EXISTING ROOF PLAN REV 1; EX06 EXISTING FRONT ELEVATION REV 1; EX07 EXISTING REAR ELEVATION REV 1; EX08 EXISTING SIDE ELEVATION REV 2; EX09 EXISTING SIDE ELEVATION REV 1; EX10 EXISTING SECTION A-A REV 1; EX11 EXISTING SECTION B-B REV 1; EX12 EXISTING SECTION C-C REV 1; EX13 EXISTING GARAGE ELEVATIONS; PH01 EXISTING SITE CONDITION; PH02 EXISTING SITE CONDITION; PH03 EXISTING SITE CONDITION; PH04 EXISTING SITE CONDITION; B02 PROPOSED BLOCK PLAN REV 1; P01 PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN REV 2; P02 PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN REV 1; P03 PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLAN REV 1; P04 PROPOSED LOFT PLAN REV 1; P05 PROPOSED ROOF PLAN REV 1; P06 PROPOSED FRONT ELEVATION REV 1; P07 PROPOSED REAR ELEVATION REV 1; P08 PROPOSED SIDE ELEVATION REV 2; P09 PROPOSED SIDE ELEVATION REV 1; P10 PROPOSED SECTION A-A REV 1; P11 PROPOSED SECTION B-B REV 1; P12 PROPOSED SECTION C-C REV 1; P13 PROPOSED SECTION D-D & ELEVATION REV 1; P14 PROPOSED SECTION E-E REV 1; P15 PROPOSED SECTION F-F REV 1; P16 PROPOSED GARDEN OUTBUILDING REV 1; P17 PROPOSED SECTION G-G & H-H REV 1; TCP 01 TREE CONSTRAINTS PLAN; TPP 01 TREE PROTECTION PLAN; DESIGN AND ACCESS STATEMENT DATED 24/05/2024; ARBORICULTURAL SURVEY TO BS5837:2012 DATED 15 APRIL 2024 (ARBTECH); ARBORICULTURAL METHOD STATEMENT DATED 26 APRIL 2024 (ARBTECH)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and the Ealing Local Plan 2024 (Reg 19).

| The development hereby approved shall comply with the recommendations set out in documents ARBORICULTURAL SURVEY TO BS5837:2012 DATED 15 APRIL 2024 (ARBTECH); ARBORICULTURAL METHOD STATEMENT DATED 26 APRIL 2024 (ARBTECH).
Reason: To comply with Policy G7 of the London Plan.

| The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwelling on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with Policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), Policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Single storey side and rear extensions, rear roof extension, and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope; Single storey detached garden outbuilding.
